nodes.text: Eufornis Major, sometimes referred to as simply Eufornis, was a prestigious ecumenopolis planet located in the galaxy's Core Worlds. Due to their similar names, Eufornis Major was occasionally confused with Eufornis Minor, a remote Outer Rim colony world.

Eufornis Major was first mentioned in Servants of the Empire: Rebel in the Ranks, the second installment in the Servants of the Empire series of canon junior novels written by Jason Fry, which was released on March 3, 2015.
